Package oracle.ateam.sample.mobile.v2.persistence.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ValueHolderInterface
    Interface used for lazy loading (aka as Indirection) of 1:1 relations in a data object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataSynchAction  
    DataSynchManager
    Class that manages remote data synchronization actions If a remote persistence manager is configured in persistence-mapping.xml for the given entity, and the create, update or remove operation on the remote persistence manager fails, for example because the device is offline or the remote server is not reachable, or the specific REST service is not running or the REST service call returns an error, then this failed remote transaction is registered as a pending data synchronization action in this manager.
    DataSynchPayload
    Class that holds a collection of data sync actions that will be synchronized in one run of the DataSynchronizer.
    DataSynchronizer
    Class that performs data synchronization on a set of data data sync actions passed in.
    DataSynchService
    This class can be used to create a bean data control to build your own UI to show pending sync actions.
    EntityCRUDService<E extends Entity>
    Abstract class that provides CRUD operations against two configurable persistence managers: a local persistence manager and a remote persistence manager.
    EntityList<E extends Entity>
    This class intercepts add/remove actions on entity list.
    IndirectList<E extends Entity>
    Class that implements lazy loading (aka as Indirection) of child collections in a domain object.
    ValueHolder
    Class that implements lazy loading (aka as Indirection) of 1:1 relations in a data object.
